name: H. P. Baxxter
description: '''Hans Peter Geerdes''' (born 16 March 1964), professionally known by his stage name '''H. P. Baxxter''', is a German musician best known as the lead vocalist of the German [[techno music|techno]] band [[Scooter (band)|Scooter]]. He founded Scooter with his friend [[Rick J. Jordan]] in 1993.
